text: New Asia Hotel in 2014 New Asia Hotel () is a 9-storey hotel and historic landmark in Hongkou, Shanghai. The hotel is situated at 422 Tiantong Road, opposite the Shanghai General Post Office Building. It was built in 1934 and was renovated in 2007. ==References== Category:Hotels in Shanghai Category:Hongkou District Category:Hotel buildings completed in 1934 Category:1934 establishments in China
title: New Asia Hotel (Shanghai)
